thread.section_title: CANDY CLUB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CANDY CLUB | candyclub.com
thread.title: Scott Schmelder
thread.title_full: CANDY CLUB reviewed by Scott Schmelder

author: Scott Schmelder
title: Scott Schmelder
text: I have been a member of the Candy Club for six months. Some of the candy I like, some I don't. This last box was extremely disappointing. I take the time to rate the candies I receive. If I give a candy one star, I really don't expect to see it again. Low and behold, this month I received one of the candies I rated one star AGAIN. Not only that, but I have received the same licorice pinwheels for 3 of the six months that I have been getting shipments, which leads me to believe that they don't have much variety. Really? The same candy 3 times in 6 months??
